name: WORLDWIDE EQUIPMENT, INC.
description: Regional heavy- and medium-truck and equipment dealer
sampleDescriptions: HR 2946 - all provisions; additional outreach efforts regarding Federal Excise Tax on heavy trucks and non-highway vehicles.
Issues related to EPA/NHTSA regulations regarding heavy truck emissions and glider kit provisions including proposed rule (EPA-HQ-OAR-2014-0827), Phase II GHG Emissions regulation.
HR 1625 - Consolidated Appropriations for FY 18 - Div G, Title II - all provisions related to US Environmental Protection Agency.
HR 2946 - all provisions; outreach and informational efforts regarding Federal Excise Tax on heavy trucks and non-highway vehicles.
Issues related to EPA/NHTSA regulations regarding heavy truck emissions and glider kit provisions including proposed rule (EPA-HQ-OAR-2014-0827), Phase II GHG Emissions regulation.
